sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: This is the gr-fft package. It contains signal processing blocks to perform FFTs and FFT-related functionality.
The Python namespace is in gnuradio.fft, which would be normally imported as:
See the Doxygen documentation for details about the blocks available in this package. A quick listing of the details can be found in Python after importing by using:
